name: Mini Motion #587
description: One of the 1,000 mind-blowing NFTs, each one it is a reflection of emotions, character and a secret story, frozen in the frame.

attributes.value:
Mini Motions is a unique collection of hand-drawn NFT characters that combine cartoon-style charm with a wide emotional spectrum.
Inspired by minion-like figures, these expressive beings transform into knights, mages, vikings, superheroes, and even zombies.

1,000 mind-blowing NFTs, each one it is a reflection of emotions, character and a secret story, frozen in the frame.
